channel.title: Comments on: If you can make it to a Scorpio Tour event – Do it!
channel.description: Web development notes and commentary from Ryan Stille

item.title: By: Mayoorathen
item.dc:creator: Mayoorathen
item.description: Well yeah I just thought about it too.. Once I was writing the code in CFscript try to put var++ and it isn't working! Then only found out the CF doesn't support. Thanks.
item.content:encoded: Well yeah I just thought about it too.. Once I was writing the code in CFscript try to put var++ and it isn’t working! Then only found out the CF doesn’t support. Thanks.

item.title: By: Axel
item.dc:creator: Axel
item.description: the ecma script operators are going to be soooooo awesome, it's just one less thing that will hold me back from going back and forth when writing in flex, and coldfusion.
item.content:encoded: the ecma script operators are going to be soooooo awesome, it’s just one less thing that will hold me back from going back and forth when writing in flex, and coldfusion.
